forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Thunder possible. High 6C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Thunder possible. High 43F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 1C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 34F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High near 5C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 41F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 2C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 36F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain...mainly in the morning. High near 5C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Periods of rain early. High 41F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Low near 0C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. Low 32F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High near 5C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 41F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. Low 29F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 4C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 39F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening followed by periods of snow showers after midnight. Low -3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional snow showers later during the night. Low 27F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers in the morning will give way to a mixture of rain and snow in the afternoon. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers in the morning will give way to a mixture of rain and snow in the afternoon. High 38F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Scattered snow flurries and snow showers before midnight. Becoming partly cloudy later. Low -4C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Scattered snow flurries and snow showers before midnight. Becoming partly cloudy later. Low near 25F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 30%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 39F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low -3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. Low 27F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning. The rain and snow will change to rain showers in the afternoon. High 4C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow early changing to all rain and becoming intermittent late. High 39F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low -2C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low 29F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning changing to rain showers late. High 3C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow early changing to all rain and becoming intermittent late. High 37F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low -3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 27F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Increasing clouds with showers arriving sometime in the afternoon. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy in the morning then periods of showers later in the day. High 37F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A wintry mix early will transition to some snow showers late. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of wintry precipitation in the evening. Then mainly snow showers overnight. Low 29F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%. Snow and ice accumulations less than one inch.
